channel.title: Teh Hammre in Xubuntu
channel.description:
Yes. I know. It's nigh on impossible.
But it can be done. can't it?
Can someone mabe tell me how to run hammer (and consequently) steam in xubuntu?
Is WINE a good option?
Please advise,
Marked One

item.title: Teh Hammre in Xubuntu
item.dc:creator: Marked_One
item.description:
Thanks, it looks like it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Teh Hammre in Xubuntu
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Marked One:

Yes. I know. It’s nigh on impossible.

But it can be done.
can’t it?

Can someone mabe tell me how to run hammer (and consequently) steam in xubuntu?

Is WINE a good option?

Please advise,

Marked One

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r93sT7UOGOE

WINE will work. Try this tutorial. I know it’s for regular ubuntu, but the same should apply. WINE’s current release is a bit buggy at the moment, however, so be careful.

EDIT: Ninja’d.

Read full topic

item.description:
